title: "What is Animal Magnetism and its History? A Compilation of Memos, Observations, and Experiments."
first_phrase: The last 200 tokens of this text discuss the opinions that the members of the Academy of Medicine should follow regarding animal magnetism. It includes various important writings on the topic, such as "Lettre sur la découverte du magnétisme animal" by P. Hervier and "Mémoire de F.A. Mesmer" by Franz Anton Mesmer. These works explore the phenomena observed during provoked nervous sleep and detail the curative applications of animal magnetism. The text also includes observations made by Dr. Bourzeis and Dr. Girardin related to the effects and examination of animal magnetism.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the history of animal magnetism and mesmerism is fascinating, and there is much to be learned from the various memoirs, observations, and protocols that have been recorded over the centuries. While some of the ideas and practices may seem outdated or controversial, there are still valuable insights to be gained about the power of the mind and the potential for healing and personal growth through practices like meditation, visualization, and energy work. Whether you are a student of history, a practitioner of alternative medicine, or simply curious about the mysteries of the human psyche, there is much to explore and discover in the world of mesmerism and animal magnetism.
